query: Gravel Revival gravel race Hickman County

videos.title: Gravel Revival Adventure Route Hickman County, Tennessee
videos.description:
The Gravel Revival Adventure route is already challenging enough. Make a majority of the course peanut butter wet after a nice February freeze-thaw, and it serves up a pretty good ass whooping on gravel.

We did 40 miles of the 44-mile adventure route that was on tap at the 2021 Gravel Revival weekend. We skipped out on the Fire Tower road section off of Highway 438. And my GoPro batteries skipped out on me after finishing the Blackwell Hollow section; so this has about half of the route we did on video. 

Here's the route: https://ridewithgps.com/routes/38254658

Check out the photos from the ride on our GGOT Facebook group page: https://www.facebook.com/groups/gravelgrindersoftennessee/permalink/516861079745802/

Please be sure to LIKE the video and SUBSCRIBE here to the YouTube channel. Thanks for watching. 

And give Gravel Grinders of Tennessee a follow on our socials:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/gravelgrindersoftennessee
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gravelgrindersoftennessee/
Ride With GPS: https://ridewithgps.com/organizations/7931-gravel-grinders-of-tennessee/home
Strava: https://www.strava.com/clubs/892813

videos.title: Hickman County, Tennessee, USA: Superb Gravel Cycling close to Nashville!
videos.description:
"Hickman County is located in the U.S. state of Tennessee. As of the 2010 census, the population was 24,690. The county was named for Edwin Hickman, an explorer and surveyor who was killed in an Indian attack at Defeated Creek in 1791." - Wikipedia.org

"The county was established in 1807, and named for Hickman at the suggestion of Robert Weakley, a legislator who had been a member of Hickman's surveying party. The original county was vast, extending to the southern border of the state. Hickman County was reduced in extent when it partially contributed to the formations of four counties: Wayne and Lawrence Counties in 1817, Perry County in 1819, and Lewis County in 1843."

Factoids: The county is the subject of the Johnny Cash song "Saturday Night In Hickman County.

Hickman County is also home to the Gosh Darn Gravel Grinder!  "The GOSH DARN was founded in 2015 by Dave Thienel and Greg O'Loughlin. Their love for the miles and miles of gravel roads, creek crossings, primitive camping, and adventure found everywhere in Hickman County, Tennessee inspired them to create a way to share the fun!" - http://goshdarn.org

Another race also calls Hickman County its home, Gravel Revival! - https://gravelrevival.wordpress.com

In this video, JOM rides a route close to 40 miles in length. This route includes plenty of hills, some u-turns, some re-routes, bush bashing / tromping about a cow pasture, a dog or two, and plenty of beautiful gravel roads adorned with beautiful scenery. I look forward to riding this area in the future!

The revised route that circumvents the issues - https://ridewithgps.com/routes/34855860

Links of Interest:
City Tour of Nashville, Tennessee - https://wp.me/p4V4se-bm7
Hickman County, Tennessee - http://hickmanco.com
Ribble CGR SL Carbon Gravel Bike Review - https://wp.me/p4V4se-bnk
Berd GVX 22 Wheelset Review - https://wp.me/p4V4se-bpQ
Panaracer Gravelking SS Tyre Review (tyres on JOM's bike)  - https://wp.me/p4V4se-aaf
Recommended Gravel Bike Tyre / Tire Pressure Guidelines - https://wp.me/p4V4se-6m3
Orange Seal Endurance Formula Review (JOM's sealant of choice) - https://wp.me/p4V4se-2t4
GUP Puncture Fix - http://gupindustries.com
JOM's Tubeless Fail Video (and Lessons Learned) - https://wp.me/p4V4se-b2n

Amazon Affiliation Link:
No cost to you, but every purchase made helps keep Gravel Cyclist up and running! - https://www.amazon.com/?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=gravelcyclist-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=6b862b6af640d29360e2af2a5f17ddc6&camp=1789&creative=9325

Web: http://GravelCyclist.com

Twitter - http://twitter.com/GravelCyclist

videos.title: The Gravel of Hickman County
videos.description:
This is the gravel in our neighborhood …

Adventured out to portions of the Gravel Revival 2021 courses this weekend and thought I’d share with y’all the variety of surfaces Hickman County has on offer.
videos.transcript:
[Music]
hey folks this is corby from gravel
grinders tennessee i am out here in the
middle of the gravel revival adventure
course for gravel revival 2021 this is
one of six courses that will be offered
over the two days one of five courses on
sunday ranging from 15 miles to 66 miles

revival.com and we'll see you soon
